title: A covert Russian mission in Syria uncovered
text:
A covert Russian mission in Syria uncovered 10:15am BST - 01:59
Reuters has witnessed on three occasions men flying from Damascus into Russia and being transported to a Russian military base, despite claims by the Kremlin it has nothing to do with private Russian citizens involved in fighting in Syria.
Reuters has witnessed on three occasions men flying from Damascus into Russia and being transported to a Russian military base, despite claims by the Kremlin it has nothing to do with private Russian citizens involved in fighting in Syria. //reut.rs/2HYXtBY
